title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 16, 2020
description: “My work is for people who want to imagine and claim wider horizons and carry on about them into the night” –poet Adrienne Rich, born this day in 1929
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “My work is for people who want to imagine and claim wider horizons and carry on about them into the night” –poet Adrienne Rich, born this day in 1929
